channel.title: Axoloti used in a new song
channel.description:
姚少龍 ALEXMALISM - 真假你我 feat. Kelvin T https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xmBkm0uWXXc
used the hardc0re k1ck patch https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QEki-13pIAk
download and more info here: http://community.axoloti.com/t/hardc0re-k1ck-for-hohum-labs-axoctrl/7236
midi version: http://community.axoloti.com/t/hardc0re-k1ck-midi-version-for-hohum-labs-axoctrl/7256

item.title: Axoloti used in a new song
item.dc:creator: @KelvinT KelvinT
item.description:
@KelvinT wrote:

姚少龍 ALEXMALISM - 真假你我 feat. Kelvin T

used the hardc0re k1ck patch

download and more info here:

Hardc0re k1ck --- for Hohum Labs Axoctrl Your Music/Projects
hardc0re k1ck is a self-contained hardcore music generator, made to be controlled by the Hohum Labs Axoctrl. available for download here: hardc0re k1ck.axp (79.3 KB) video available here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QEki-13pIAk Inspired by hardcore, speedcore & gabber music, hardc0re k1ck is an attempt to turn the Axoloti into a functional self-contained club-ready music box. It contains a kick drum synth (hard kick), distortion & glitch effects (neuro fx), and a pattern generator for th…

midi version:

Hardc0re k1ck (midi version) --- for Hohum Labs Axoctrl Your Music/Projects
hardc0re k1ck (midi version) is a midi-controllable version of the original hardc0re k1ck patch with added functionalities, made to be controlled by the Hohum Labs Axoctrl. available for download here: hardc0re k1ck midi.axp (69.9 KB) original patch video (original version): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QEki-13pIAk18 new video coming soon for midi version Inspired by hardcore, speedcore & gabber music, the original hardc0re k1ck is an attempt to turn the Axoloti into a functional self-con…
